thread.title: Priceline Group Rebrands to Booking Holdings

author: Imani Moise
title: Priceline Group Rebrands to Booking Holdings

organizations.name: priceline group rebrands to booking holdings priceline group inc.

text:
Priceline Group Inc. is now Booking Holdings Inc., a name the company says better reflects the nature of its business.
The newly branded company said Wednesday it will continue trading on Nasdaq, but will begin using the ticker symbol “BKNG” on Feb. 27.

Priceline made its market debut in 1999 as a company that owned one website that let consumers... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
